name: Kursor 2022
description:
What is this?

A simple game where you just have to move your mouse cursor and cross the obstacles to reach the finish line.

This game is still under development.

System Requirements:
  • Operating System: Windows 7/8/10/11 (64bit)
    • Processor: 1.5 GHz
    • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
    • Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics card
    • DirectX: Version 9.0c
    • Storage: 200 MB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
